appInstaller.nativeAppios.shouldDwn: You may still use the Website to browse and track active or settled bets; however, if you want to place wagers or Cash Out then download the app and be located in NJ to play.

Transaction.Sightline.Enroll.Note1: Verifying your Sportsbook Rhode Island Play+ instruction for transactions, please wait...
Transaction.Sightline.Enroll.Note4:
• Fund with your Credit or Debit Card, Pay With My Bank, or PayPal
  • Fast Deposits and Cash-Outs
  • Use everywhere Mastercard® is accepted and at ATMs nationwide
Transaction.Sightline.Enroll.Note5:
• Enroll in Sportsbook Rhode Island Play+ today
  • Fund with your Credit or Debit Card, Pay With My Bank, or PayPal
  • Fast Deposits and Cash-Outs
  • Receive your physical Sportsbook Rhode Island Play+ card in as little as 10-14 days
  • Use everywhere Mastercard® is accepted and at ATMs nationwide
  • In order to wager, you must transfer funds from your Rhode Island Play+ account to your Sportsbook Rhode Island account
Transaction.Sightline.Funding.Title: Fund your Sportsbook Rhode Island Play+ account
Transaction.Sightline.SB.Info: In order to wager, you must transfer funds from your Play+ account to your Sportsbook Rhode Island account.
Transaction.Sightline.Funding.Note1:
• Step 1: Click Fund Play+ to add funds to your Play+ account with a Credit or Debit Card, Pay With My Bank, or PayPal.
  • Step 2: Transfer from Sportsbook Rhode Island Play+ to Sportsbook Rhode Island by clicking Deposit in the Cashier.
Account.SequentialVerification.Verificat:
We were unable to verify your account using our automated identity and email verification system. Please click on the box below to start the guided verification process.

Please verify your mobile device below if you would like to opt in for two factor authentication and text message notifications from Sportsbook Rhode Island.
Account.SequentialVerification.VerifyByP:
Your mobile number should be verified in order to use Two Factor Authentication.
You will receive an SMS with PIN.

Your email address should be verified in order to use Two Factor Authentication.
You will receive an email with PIN.

Account.DepositThreshold.Info: You have deposited a cumulative of $2,500 in your Sportsbook Rhode Island account. In order to continue wagering, you are required to acknowledge the following:
Account.DepositThreshold.Info.Details:
1. You have reached the Division's cumulative deposit threshold of $2,500
  2. You have the option to establish responsible gambling limits or close your account
  3. If you or someone you know has a gambling problem and wants help, please call 1-877-9GAMBLE (1-877-942-6253)
Account.CareerStats.Info: Amount you've bet and won since you joined Sportsbook Rhode Island:
Account.Verification.Customer.MobileNumb: Mobile number verification in-progress. Please wait...
Accounting.ResponsibleGaming.title: We are committed to providing you a safe and responsible wagering environment, offering you a variety of ways for you to set your limits or exclude altogether. Check out your options below or contact our customer support at 1-800-248-2511
Account.JoinUs.RGLangage: For the purposes of responsible gambling, this website provides you the ability to set limits on your activity. If you are interested in implementing responsible gambling limits such as deposit, loss, and time limits, as well as cooling off periods or self-exclusion from online gambling,  please look for the responsible gambling logo or the responsible gambling page for additional information
Payments.PlayPlus.Desc.Withdraw: Withdrawal funds back to your Sportsbook Rhode Island Play+ card
Transaction.CashInShop.Withdraw.Title: Cash Withdrawal At The Casino
Transaction.CashInShop.Withdraw.Desc: Get the authorization code and Withdraw funds at the casino.
Transaction.CashInShop.Withdraw.Page.Des: You will get an authorization code to use when cashing out at the casino.
The specified amount will be locked until cashed out at the casino.
Footer.FindOutMoreAboutRI: Find out more about Sportsbook Rhode Island
Footer.info.gamblingProblem: If you or someone you know has a gambling problem and wants help, call 1-877-9GAMBLE (1-877-942-6253)
Footer.playResponsiblyDesc: Please play responsibly. If you or someone you know may have a gambling problem, call the problem Gambling Helpline, 1-877-9GAMBLE, sponsored by the Rhode Island Lottery.  Available 24 hours a day to listen, to help, and provide information.
Footer.companyAboutDesc: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Praesent condimentum faucibus dui in rhoncus. Nam consectetur, risus ac feugiat porttitor, urna erat efficitur velit, vehicula tincidunt libero diam ac elit. Ut lobortis felis sed lectus euismod consectetur.
Footer.oceanState: This website, www.sportsbetrhodeisland.com, is the official website of Sportsbook Rhode Island. It is UNLAWFUL for anyone under the age of 18 to wager on this site. Although every effort is made to ensure the accuracy of the information on this website, mistakes can occur. If you have questions, please contact player support at (800) 248-2511 or visit the Bally’s Lincoln casino or the Bally’s Tiverton casino.
